[00:00.00]Slide (Explicit) - H.E.R./YG
[00:00.75]Lyrics by：H.E.R./Ron LaTour/Tiara Thomas/Elijah Dias/Steven Arrington/Charles Carter/Shawn Carter/Waung Hankerson/Jermaine Dupri/Roger Parker/Keenon Daequan Ray Jackson
[00:01.50]Composed by：H.E.R./Ron LaTour/Tiara Thomas/Elijah Dias/Steven Arrington/Charles Carter/Shawn Carter/Waung Hankerson/Jermaine Dupri/Roger Parker/Keenon Daequan Ray Jackson
[00:02.26]YG：
[00:02.27]You always wear them glasses
[00:06.55]You don't wanna let no sucka look you in your eyes huh
[00:09.61]Better show off them eyelashes
[00:13.53]You love what you do with a passion
[00:15.48]Oh that s**t attractive
[00:17.82]I f**k with you girl
[00:19.23]H.E.R.：
[00:19.97]All you wanna do is gas me
[00:22.28]How we end up in the backseat
[00:24.71]Just tryna get to the bag
[00:27.14]We on the same page you the same way
[00:29.88]Only keep the fam' around me
[00:32.32]So let me know what it's gon' be
[00:34.83]I don't plan on gettin' no sleep while we
[00:38.55]H.E.R.：
[00:39.21]Doin' our thing movin' too fast
[00:41.52]Candy paint with the windows all black
[00:43.72]Seats crème brûlée what they gon' say
[00:46.55]With the top down screamin'
[00:47.74]Money ain't a thing
[00:48.80]We up till six in the mornin'
[00:51.46]When the sunrise we'll be on it
[00:53.96]Know I got five you know it's all live
[00:56.50]Tell me when to go baby when we gon' stop
[00:58.54]Baby when we go slide hey hey
[01:01.93]
[01:02.63]Up all night baby when we goin' slide
[01:06.64]Oh yeah yeah
[01:08.53]Baby when we goin'
[01:09.69]Slide slide slide oh yeah slide oh
[01:16.40]H.E.R.：
[01:19.29]I don't care if we on the run
[01:21.74]Nothin' matters when we one on one
[01:24.18]Lookin' at us 'cause we goin' dumb
[01:26.55]We on the same wave you the same way
[01:29.24]You know I be down if it's with you
[01:31.62]Where we goin' baby what's the move
[01:34.13]We should take a trip up to the moon
[01:36.92]Get a room
[01:37.79]H.E.R.：
[01:38.59]Doin' our thing movin' too fast
[01:40.92]Candy paint with the windows all black
[01:43.10]Seats crème brûlée what they gon' say
[01:45.97]With the top down screamin'
[01:47.12]Money ain't a thing
[01:48.10]We up till six in the mornin'
[01:50.76]When the sunrise we'll be on it
[01:53.30]Know I got five you know it's all live
[01:55.83]Tell me when to go baby when we gon' stop
[01:57.92]Baby when we go slide hey hey
[02:01.95]Up all night baby when we goin' slide
[02:06.04]Yeah up all night baby when we goin' slide
[02:11.14]Oh up all night baby when we goin' slide
[02:15.65]YG：
[02:15.97]Four hunnid
[02:17.79]I need a baecation
[02:20.15]I need my b***h in an apron
[02:22.55]Booty all out cookin' bacon
[02:24.83]Orange juice and Ace so we drankin'
[02:27.51]I only come out when the star's out
[02:29.97]I'm on a mission but we far out
[02:32.43]This city talkin' with a large mouth
[02:34.73]Yeah they after the boy like fall out
[02:37.58]Four hunnid
[02:38.39]Drop it give me fifty girl drop it give me fifty
[02:40.89]Used to side with me 'cause you be trippin' when you miss me
[02:43.37]You go hold me close and on yo neck gon' be a hickie
[02:45.80]I ain't gotta do to much I know what get you sticky
[02:48.28]I ain't gotta know astrology I know yo vibes
[02:50.80]Skip the foreplay you won't let n***as f**k with yo mind
[02:53.33]I ain't given' out apologies when I'm behind
[02:55.78]F**kin' up the seats of the brand new ride
[02:57.63]H.E.R.：
[02:58.05]Doin' our thing movin' too fast
[03:00.14]Candy paint with the windows all black

[03:07.53]We up till six in the mornin'
[03:09.99]When the sunrise we'll be on it
[03:12.49]Know I got five you know it's all live
[03:14.90]Tell me when to go baby when we gon' stop
[03:17.12]Baby when we go slide hey hey
[03:21.13]Up all night baby when we goin' slide
[03:25.14]Yeah up all night baby when we goin' slide
[03:30.17]Oh up all night baby when we goin' slide

data.trans:
[ti:Slide (Explicit)]
[ar:H.E.R./YG]
[al:Slide (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.75]//
[00:01.50]//
[00:02.26]//
[00:02.27]你总是戴着墨镜
[00:06.55]你不想让那些傻瓜直视你的双眼
[00:09.61]你最好给他们翻个白眼
[00:13.53]满腔热血 对自己的事业情有独钟
[00:15.48]你真是迷人
[00:17.82]我和你的妹子在一起
[00:19.23]//
[00:19.97]你只想让我扫兴而归
[00:22.28]我们怎么会在后排座位上结束感情
[00:24.71]我只想赚到盆满钵满
[00:27.14]我们不谋而合 你还是老样子
[00:29.88]只有家人陪伴着我
[00:32.32]让我知道接下来会发生什么
[00:34.83]我不想彻夜辗转反侧
[00:38.55]//
[00:39.21]专心做我们的事 动作敏捷 无人能及
[00:41.52]把黑色窗户描绘上五彩斑斓的颜色
[00:43.72]美女作伴 他们会怎么说
[00:46.55]开着敞篷车 大声呐喊
[00:47.74]金钱无关紧要
[00:48.80]我们彻夜未眠 一直熬到早上六点
[00:51.46]太阳升起 我们继续前行
[00:53.96]知道我大获全胜 你知道美梦成真
[00:56.50]告诉我 何时该离开 宝贝 何时该停下
[00:58.54]宝贝 当我们出发 畅通无阻
[01:01.93]
[01:02.63]彻夜未眠 宝贝 我们何时会平步青云
[01:06.64]//
[01:08.53]宝贝 当我们出发
[01:09.69]畅通无阻
[01:16.40]//
[01:19.29]我不在乎我们是否会四处奔波
[01:21.74]只要我们团结一致 我们会无人能敌
[01:24.18]看看我们 我们一言不发
[01:26.55]我们在同一条战线上
[01:29.24]你知道与你在一起我会沉沦
[01:31.62]我们去哪里 宝贝 你有何行动
[01:34.13]我们应该飞向月球
[01:36.92]找到更广阔的天地
[01:37.79]//
[01:38.59]专心做我们的事 动作敏捷 无人能及
[01:40.92]把黑色窗户描绘上五彩斑斓的颜色
[01:43.10]美女作伴 他们会怎么说
[01:45.97]开着敞篷车 大声呐喊
[01:47.12]金钱无关紧要
[01:48.10]我们彻夜未眠 一直熬到早上六点
[01:50.76]太阳升起 我们继续前行
[01:53.30]知道我大获全胜 你知道美梦成真
[01:55.83]告诉我 何时该离开 宝贝 何时该停下
[01:57.92]宝贝 当我们出发 畅通无阻
[02:01.95]彻夜未眠 宝贝 我们何时会平步青云
[02:06.04]彻夜未眠 宝贝 我们何时会平步青云
[02:11.14]彻夜未眠 宝贝 我们何时会平步青云
[02:15.65]//
[02:15.97]数不尽的钞票
[02:17.79]我需要放松一下
[02:20.15]我要我的妹子只着寸缕
[02:22.55]露出凹凸有致的身材 为我烹饪美食
[02:24.83]特调橙汁 我们喝得醉醺醺的
[02:27.51]夜幕降临之后我才会现身
[02:29.97]我背负着使命 可我们很激进
[02:32.43]这里的人都口无遮拦
[02:34.73]他们对那个男孩穷追不舍
[02:37.58]数不尽的钞票
[02:38.39]尽情放纵 一掷千金 身边全是美女
[02:40.89]你曾经和我共进退 当你思念着我 你会无法自拔
[02:43.37]你紧紧地抱着我 脖子上的项链耀眼夺目
[02:45.80]我不用做太多 我知道你离不开我的原因
[02:48.28]我不需要了解占星术 我知道你对我用情至深
[02:50.80]跳过前戏 你不会让其他人扰乱你的心
[02:53.33]即使我落后 我也毫无愧疚
[02:55.78]把这些崭新的跑车全部拿下
[02:57.63]//
